title: tanjamenap-paNivOrai
sahitya:
tanjamenap-paNivOrait-tAngit-tuNai purivAn shen cEri malai mEvum sEvark-koDiyuDaiyOn


anupallavi

  nenjam ayarndiDavE neDu mUccerindiDavE cancalam minjiDavE kenjit-tannait-tEDi


caraNam    koDiya tolvinaiyin piDiyil aghappaTTut-tan aDiyAr paTTu varum viDiyAt-tollai tIra
vaDivElanaDi pOTri vaNangiDa shen cEri vandu abhayam cintai karaiyak-kOri
